page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF KATHY.
page.content: I get up at 8 00 and go down stairs for my breakfast,I have Rice Crispies. At 8 30 I go upstairs for my wash.At a quarter two nine I go to school.When we get to school Mr.Bishop does the register.Then we go to assembly.After assembly we do maths then its playtime.After playtime we go to our school library to choose new books then its dinnertime.After dinner we have a games lesson,we play netball in the winter and do athletics and play rounders in the summer after games we have playtime.Our last lesson of the day is drama with Miss.Parr then its time to go home.When I get home I have a packet of crisps and then I go and play with my friend Katie Deans. I usually watch television in the evening and at half past nine I have a wash, brush my teeth and I go to bed.
